trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_000_000<tab>Well met! I am Scanningway, data analyst for the Cosmic Exploration Initiative. Should you choose to join us, I would welcome your support.
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_100_000<tab>Well met! I am Scanningway, data analyst for the Cosmic Exploration Initiative.
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_100_010<tab>My duty is to record the efforts of each member and tally them up at regular intervals.

TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_100_020<tab>Not only does this data improve the efficiency of the initiative as a whole, but it highlights the individuals whose achievements are worthy of a reward.
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_100_030<tab>Members with the highest metrics within a given period are given the vaunted title of “Star Contributor.”
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_100_035<tab>As a token of our appreciation, anyone recognized as such shall have their name displayed prominently for all to see!
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_100_040<tab>If you should have any questions, I recommend that you consult your exotablet.
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_200_000<tab>Thank you for your contributions to the Cosmic Exploration Initiative, but I'm afraid your metrics are not being recorded at this time.

TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_000<tab>Thank you for your contributions to the Cosmic Exploration Initiative! Rest assured I have been recording everyone's metrics for the current data collection period.
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SYSTEM_300_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_Q1_300_000<tab>Check current standing.
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_Q1_300_010<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_Q1_300_020<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_010<tab>My apologies. I am not currently recording any metrics, so I'm afraid I have nothing to offer you.
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_020<tab>Let me just pull up your latest metrics for the current data collection period... Ah, here we are!
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_030<tab>At present, you have reached...the top ten percent!? That's astounding! You just might be one of our Star Contributors this period!
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_040<tab>At present, you have reached...the top twenty percent! Keep it up, and the title of “Star Contributor” could be yours this period!
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_050<tab>At present, you have reached...the top thirty percent. An impressive achievement!
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_060<tab>At present, you have reached...the top fifty percent. You can do better than average, surely! Keep at it!
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_070<tab>At present, you have reached... Well, your name has been recorded, if nothing else. Take your time!
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_080<tab>It appears I have no record of your achievements this period. Now's the time to get started!
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_090<tab>Well, well, if it isn't Star Contributor <var 29 EB02 /var> in the flesh! On behalf of the initiative, thank you for all your hard work!
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_100<tab>Well, well, if it isn't Star Contributor <var 29 EB02 /var> in the flesh!

TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_110<tab>As of this data collection period, you are once again eligible to earn the title. Let that serve as motivation for even greater contributions, hmmm?
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_300_120<tab>Now, where were we...? Ah, yes, your latest metrics!
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SYSTEM_300_010<tab>Upon selection, Star Contributors cannot be reselected for fourteen days.

TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SYSTEM_300_020<tab>You will regain eligibility starting <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var>:00 <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> on <var 08 E4E94E04 (( <var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> (Earth date).

TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_400_000<tab>My duty is to record the efforts of each member. Not only does this data improve the efficiency of the initiative as a whole, but it highlights the individuals whose achievements are worthy of a reward.

TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_400_010<tab>Members with the highest metrics within a given period are given the vaunted title of “Star Contributor.” Work hard, and you just might be one of them someday!
TEXT_CTSWKSDELEGATIONMEMBER_00927_SCANNINGWAY_400_020<tab>If you should have any questions, I recommend that you consult your exotablet.
